Glint-Eye's power and toughness are each equal to the number of cards in your graveyard.
Whenever Glint-Eye attacks, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw that many cards.
Whenever Dune-Brood attacks, create a 1/1 colorless Desert Sand land creature token for each land you control.

Whenever a player casts a spell with a single target, that player copies that spell for each other spell, permanent, card not on the battlefield, and/or player the spell could target. Each copy targets a different one of them.
Whenever you cast a spell from your hand, copy it, then exile that card with 3 time counters on it. If the exiled card doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend.

Whenever Yore-Tiller attacks, exile target creature card from your graveyard. For each opponent, you may create a token that's a copy of that creature that's tapped and attacking that player or a planeswalker they control. Exile those tokens at end of combat.
Each land is a Plains in addition to its other types.
Each land is an Island in addition to its other types.
Each land is a Swamp in addition to its other types.
Each land is a Mountain in addition to its other types.
Each land is a Forest in addition to its other types.
